alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Randolph; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:05PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Randolph, north central Calhoun and southwestern Terrell Counties in southwestern Georgia through 445 PM EDT... At 405 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shellman, or 10 miles north of Morgan. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morgan, Shellman, Fountain Bridge, Goffs Mill, Pachitla, Shivers Mill, Aycock Mill, Martins Crossroads and Cordrays Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
